<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### handleDisconnect() {#a8477fb0a7c21a1860bd529ebbb3b09ea}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::orc::SimpleRemoteEPCTransportClient::handleDisconnect (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> Err)</>}>
Handle a disconnection from the underlying transport.

No further messages should be sent to handleMessage after this is called. Err may contain an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> value indicating unexpected disconnection. This allows clients to log such errors, but no attempt should be made at recovery (which should be handled inside the transport class, if it is supported at all).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-h/#l00075">75</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-h">SimpleRemoteEPCUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### handleMessage() {#a756770283ea204755873a23eb1324f69}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Expected&lt; HandleMessageAction &gt; llvm::orc::SimpleRemoteEPCTransportClient::handleMessage (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a1448b52253eb43f8f07b7f5d94336a47">SimpleRemoteEPCOpcode</a> OpC, uint64&#95;t SeqNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> TagAddr, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a7b57ebab4d32c81530df07ac39a3b0ca">SimpleRemoteEPCArgBytesVector</a> ArgBytes)</>}>
Handle receipt of a message.

Returns an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> if the message cannot be handled, &#39;EndSession&#39; if the client will not accept any further messages, and &#39;ContinueSession&#39; otherwise.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-h">SimpleRemoteEPCUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
